title: Bikes of the Tour de France: Pogačar’s Colnago, Di2 paired with SRAM, and more
content:
The traditional Tour de France pit walks aren’t quite back yet, but we’ve managed to dig up quite a bit of tech for you to kick off this year’s Grande Boucle.

In this video, we walk you through Tadej Pogačar’s Colnago, now with disc brakes, Michael Matthews’ custom-painted Bianchi, Toms Skujins’ shiny new Trek, and we spot some Shimano shift buttons being used with SRAM shifters.
author: Ronan Mc Laughlin
